TextLibrary.Text: Khrona
It is time for me to head north and look for this Mechataur. Gruulkar says it lives in the Hornburg. Do you know where that is?
It is time for me to head north and look for this Mechataur. Gruulkar says it lives in the Hornburg. Do you know where that is?
It is time for me to head north and look for this Mechataur. Gruulkar says it lives in the Hornburg. Do you know where that is?
It is time for me to head north and look for this Mechataur. Gruulkar says it lives in the Hornburg. Do you know where that is?
Yes. It is in the mountains north of here bordering the Realms of War, but the paths through there are difficult and dangerous. Even Khalkus would have trouble finding a trail.
Yes. It is in the mountains north of here bordering the Realms of War, but the paths through there are difficult and dangerous. Even Khalkus would have trouble finding a trail.
Yes. It is in the mountains north of here bordering the Realms of War, but the paths through there are difficult and dangerous. Even Khalkus would have trouble finding a trail.
Yes. It is in the mountains north of here bordering the Realms of War, but the paths through there are difficult and dangerous. Even Khalkus would have trouble finding a trail.
I'll find a way. Thank you for your hospitality, Khrona.
I'll find a way. Thank you for your hospitality, Khrona.
I'll find a way. Thank you for your hospitality, Khrona.
I'll find a way. Thank you for your hospitality, Khrona.
It is we who should thank you. Even so, there is one more favor I would ask of you - it is not out of your way.
It is we who should thank you. Even so, there is one more favor I would ask of you - it is not out of your way.
It is we who should thank you. Even so, there is one more favor I would ask of you - it is not out of your way.
It is we who should thank you. Even so, there is one more favor I would ask of you - it is not out of your way.
Very well.
Very well.
Very well.
Very well.
The miners in Northern Kor have captured a Dragon. As you are passing through, could you help them... ahh... dispose of it?

The miners in Northern Kor have captured a Dragon. As you are passing through, could you help them... ahh... dispose of it?
I'd be glad to help.
I'd be glad to help.
I'd be glad to help.
I'd be glad to help.
